Confirm the position of the gastric tube.sentence: The nurse prepares the necessary equipment for confirming the position of the gastric tube.
Confirm the position of the gastric tube.subject: The nurse

Confirm the position of the gastric tube.sentence: The nurse inserts a syringe into the gastric tube and withdraws a small amount of gastric contents.
Confirm the position of the gastric tube.subject: The nurse

Confirm the position of the gastric tube.sentence: The nurse tests the pH of the gastric contents using pH test strips.
Confirm the position of the gastric tube.subject: The nurse
Confirm the position of the gastric tube.object: the pH of the gastric contents

Confirm the position of the gastric tube.sentence: The nurse listens with a stethoscope while injecting air into the gastric tube to confirm placement.
Confirm the position of the gastric tube.subject: The nurse
Confirm the position of the gastric tube.object: while injecting air into the gastric tube
